<div id="data_types" class="registered_link"></div>

EDB Postgres Advanced Server has the following data types.

- [Numeric types](01_numeric_types.mdx)
- [Monetary types](monetary_types)
- [Character types](02_character_types)
- Binary data types
- Date/time types
- Boolean type
- Enumerated types
- Geometric types
- Network address types
- Arrays
- Composite types
- Range types
- Domain types
- Object Identifier types
- pg_lsn type
- Pseudo-types
